Translations.Text: Nweeea i Musa: "veggeo taakwazt ik"! Apan tesseblaa ayen d uenaan
Tuao tidep, inqev wayen xeddmen
Akka ay pwa$elben. U$alen ar deffir, d unqisen
£lin iseeearen, knan
Nnan: "numen s Mass imavalen
Mass n Musa akked Haoun
Inna Feraun: "day tumnem yis, uqbel ma aammde$ awen? Ayagi, war ccekk, d tifxep. Tundim p di temdint, iwakken a ppessuff$em, segs, imezda$ is. Ihi, deqqal a ppeeoem
War ccekk, ad awen gezme$ afus ssya, avao ssya. Sinna, ih, a kwen semmoe$ akw $ef imudag
Nnan: "nekwni a nu$al ar Mass nne
Terriv d ppao segne$, imi kan numen s issekniyen n Mass nne$, mi $ d usan. A Mass nne$! Azen a$ d uubeo, Ddem leowae nne$ d imvuaen

Imvebboen n ugdud n Feraun, nnan: "day a ppeooev Musa akked ugdud is, ad ssefsaden di tmurt, a kwen ooen, kecc akked ioebbiten ik"? Inna: "a nene$ arrac nnsen, a nessider tilawin nnsen. Nekwni, sennig sen, d iqehhaoen
Inna Musa i ugdud is: "ppret afus n Oebbi, u ueboet. Tamurt, war ccekk, n Oebbi. A p iwoet win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Taggara i wid ipeezziben
Nnan: "njaf uqbel a $ d tasev, u deffir tisin ik". Inna: "amar Mass nnwen ad Ine$ acengu nnwen, a kwen Irr d igensas di tmurt, ad Iwali amek ara txedmem
Newwet, d$a, lois n Feraun s iseggwasen n llae, akked nneqs n ppemoa, amar a d mmektin
Ma iusa ten id ise$, ad inin: "nne$ wagi". Ma tusa ten id tucmip, a p sbibben i Musa akked wid illan yides. Ayen iveooun yidsen, day macci ar Oebbi kan? Maca, tegwti segsen ur ssinen
Nnan: " wicqa assekni ara d tawiv, ur a$ tepseeeirev yis. Nekwni, ur neppamen yisek
Nuzen asen aeemmal, ajoad, tilkin, imqweoqwoen, idammen, d issekniyen ifeulen. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud ibe$wviyen
Mi tevoa yidsen twa$it, qqaoen: "a Musa! Naao Mass ik i nekwni, s wayen i k Iaahed. Ma tekksev a$ tawa$it, a namen yisek, a nazen yidek At Isoail
Mi sen Nekkes tawa$it, ar lajel iten iggunin, atnan nitni xedaan
Nerra d segsen ppao, N$emq iten deg ill, imi skaddben issekniyen nne£, ur d celaen degsen
Nessewoet i ugdud i illan qehoen t, igmav akked ituram n tmurt, i Neoqa. Itam wawal uuam n Mass ik, $ef At Isoail, ilmend n wayen ueboen. Nhudd ayen iuennaa Feraun akked ugdud is, u wayen bennun
Nesaadda ill i At Isoail. Mmugren d agdud i iaabden tiaancuoin is. Nnan: "a Musa! Err ane$ oebbi am ioebbiten nnsen". Inna: "kunwi, s tidep, d agdud ur nessin
Wigi, s tidep, ad inger wayen ideg llan, ad inqev wayen xeddmen
Inna: "day awen budde$ oebbi, war Oebbi, u Neppa Ismenyaf ikwen $ef imavalen
Mi kwen Nsellek si lois n Feraun, sukken fellawen aaaqeb uqsie mavi; neqqen arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, ajeooeb s$uo Mass nnwen ameqwoaean
